Our estimates were enabled by 1) data from a nationally representative survey about sexual identity among men as well as their sexually active status [ 22]; 2) pragmatic PrEP guidelines and eligibility criteria which are based on evidence from local observational studies about factors that have contributed to HIV transmission among Australian gay men [ 17, 29], and 3) the availability of national behavioural surveillance data from gay men [ 24, 25].
